system.requirements: Ork Weirdboy, Da Power of Waaagh!, Psyniscience +10
system.effect: The Character can attempt to guide a vessel through the Warp using the normal rules for doing so. However they cannot estimate the journey dduration (counting as failed by 1 DoF), and cannot locate the Astronomicon (suffering -20 to all tests to Navigate the Warp), finally they do not use Navigate(Warp) whenever required to do so, instead making Survival Tests.

description.value: The Character can attempt to guide a vessel through the Warp using the normal rules for doing so.
